channel.title: Rune Warfare [Economy Server] DL Now :)
channel.description:
Hello Everyone, this is my second server release..... I added many things in this Delta server, very many thing and changed a lot.
When you logg in you will be supplied with a starter kit. When you logg in you will be given exp to attack, strength, ranged, mage and hit points.
I added a new home, in Saphonem it is really great with Nulodian as the rares shop keeper. Each rare costs 1000m cash and D claws cost 2147m Cash. No need for donation only items, cause you know those people just want money....
I added more talk able npc's to chat with if your bored, also melee/range/mage following works perfectly.
I added many commands, and portals also many teleports.
Commands:
[code] [size=14pt]Player Commands[/size]
::commands ::yell ::changepassword ::bossinfo ::modinfo ::godwars (takes you too a snowy place and you have to walk to dungeon.) ::elemental ::kq ::home ::shops ::train [/code]
It gives players a selection to choose from, and most people like entering commands.
The client of the server was only showing lava textures so I changed it back to original water and fire cape is still made from lava.
I worked really hard on this and I'd like you all to try out this source cause it's amazing.
Pictures:
[img]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/5998/skillersarea.png[/img]
[img]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/4/pxbox.png[/img]
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8708/hometelespot.png[/img]
[img]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/447/assaultshop.png[/img]
[img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8273/customitems.png[/img]
[img]http://img2.imageshack.us/img2/6150/clawsspec.png[/img]
[size=18pt]CREDITS TO: JAD AND DELTA and[/size] [size=24pt]More to me![/size]
[size=36pt]Client And Server At..... [url=http://WWW.CLIENTWAR.TK]WWW.CLIENTWAR.TK[/url][/size]

item.description:
@Z4marok_M0nk wrote:

Hello Everyone, this is my second server release…
I added many things in this Delta server, very many thing and changed a lot.

When you logg in you will be supplied with a starter kit.
When you logg in you will be given exp to attack, strength, ranged, mage and hit points.

I added a new home, in Saphonem it is really great with Nulodian as the rares shop keeper.
Each rare costs 1000m cash and D claws cost 2147m Cash.
No need for donation only items, cause you know those people just want money…

I added more talk able npc’s to chat with if your bored, also melee/range/mage following works perfectly.

I added many commands, and portals also many teleports.

Commands:

[size=14pt]Player Commands[/size]

::commands
::yell
::changepassword
::bossinfo
::modinfo
::godwars (takes you too a snowy place and you have to walk to dungeon.)
::elemental
::kq
::home
::shops
::train

It gives players a selection to choose from, and most people like entering commands.

The client of the server was only showing lava textures so I changed it back to original water and fire cape is still made from lava.

I worked really hard on this and I’d like you all to try out this source cause it’s amazing.
